description: Children around the world are alike and different in many ways. Friends Around the World gives students a glimpse into the lives of children from Brazil, China, India, Nigeria, and South Korea. The book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast and to recognize and use proper nouns as names of places. The book and lesson are also available for levels H and N.
